"Sword User Post-Newbie":
"<%me>!
I've finally gotten used to calling you by your real
name! But my request this time's going to be a tough
one. I want you to complete the "Lost Sea Mineral
Transport" mission using swords only, and do it fast!
It'll probably be a little tough for a post-newbie such
as yourself, but give it a try!
*Using swords only, complete the mission within
20 minutes and earn an S Rank on Hard difficulty
or above."

"来た、<%me>！
よーやく名前で呼ぶのも慣れてきたわ！
今回の課題はきっついわよー！
大剣だけで、貴重物資運搬計画：砂漠を
さくさくっとクリアしてみせてよ！
まー、へっぽこぴーだったアンタには
ちょーっと厳しい課題だと思うけどねー。
ま、やれるもんならやってみなさいな！
※大剣系限定
ハード以上、２０分以内、Ｓランククリア"
